q_en: What products are included in James's order?
gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the products included in James's order. Here's a neat table for you:

| Product ID | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|----------------|-------------|
| 6          | Brown, L size  | Jacket      |
| 7          | Purple, M size | Skirt       |
| 14         | Yellow, L size | Jacket      |
| 22         | Brown, S size  | Jacket      |
| 26         | Red, M size    | Coat        |

James has quite a stylish selection, don't you think? üß•üëó

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'James';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "James"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '4';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the orders placed by the customer "James"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (4, 12);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the products included in the orders of the customer "James"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (22, 26, 14, 6, 7);
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and types for the products included in the orders of the customer "James"
